EmailTemplate.description: Email that is sent to the Manager on the Submittal Record to review the Submitted Candidate Contact.
EmailTemplate.name: Submittal Review Process
EmailTemplate.subject: Submittal Review for the {!Submittal__c.Job__c} Position
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Submittal__c.HiringManager__c},
{!Submittal__c.Candidate__c} has been submitted for review for the {!Submittal__c.Job__c} position. Click on the link below to review the details of this candidates.
http://SITES_URL_HERE/SubmittalProcess?key=[Submittal Key Merge Field]
Thank you.
